featured.text: What does “a crucial time” in the last paragraph refer to? (A) When the vessel hits a flat.
Much of the forest land where tea is grown in Assam is flat and thus farmers must dig drainage trenches to prevent water from accumulating and hurting the shrubs.

definition.zh_def: 平坦的，沒有高低起伏的。
definition.en_def: Having a level surface; not raised or depressed.
definition.example: The road was flat and easy to ride on.
